body: people getting triggered over male characters

Personally I'm fine with Male Characters if there done right either in Neptunia Hentai or Just Regular Neptunia Stories.

I'm not gonna shame people who either likes or dislikes this kind of Story because people's taste are always different from each other.
Trash. People really need to understand that there is no place for a male character in a Neptunia hentai. Either make classic yuri or futa, there are no other options.
I agree with jazzboy, but coloring is hard so I understand. 8/10
